description: p29resultgroupcl: Result group from MRD PCR day 29, indicating the percentage of leukemia cells present in the sample (1: >=25%, 2: >=5%, 3: >=0.1% - <5%, 4: <0.1%, 5: <0.1%, 8: Sample not taken, 9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible).

details.9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible
